text: Harry Van Den Ham (born 16 August 1954) is a Dutch professional football manager and former player, who is the manager of Eerste Divisie club FC Dordrecht. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%; "text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Utrecht |1975–76 |rowspan="4"|Eredivisie |10||1||0||0||0||0||10||1 |- |1976–77 |7||0||0||0||0||0||7||0 |- |1977–78 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |1978–79 |8||2||1Appearances in the KNVB Cup||0||0||0||9||2 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !25!!3!!1!!0!!0!!0!!26!!3 |- |Cambuur (loan) |1977–78 |rowspan="5"|Eerste Divisie |29||10||2||1||0||0||31||11 |- |Den Bosch (loan) |1978–79 |9||2||0||0||0||0||9||2 |- |rowspan="4"|DS '79 |1979–80 |34||17||3||2||0||0||37||19 |- |1980–81 |21||3||0||0||0||0||21||3 |- |1981–82 |19||7||0||0||0||0||19||7 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !74!!27!!3!!2!!0!!0!!77!!29 |- |Tulsa Roughnecks (loan) |1980 |NASL |4||0||0||0||0||0||4||0 |- |rowspan="3"|Utrecht |1983–84 |rowspan="2"|Eredivisie |15||5||0||0||0||0||15||5 |- |1984–85 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !15!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!15!!5 |- |PEC Zwolle (loan) |1984–85 |Eredivisie |15||1||0||0||0||0||15||1 |- |VVV-Venlo |1988–89 |rowspan="2"|Eerste Divisie |10||1||0||0||0||0||10||1 |- |Vlissingen |1990–91 |25||2||0||0||0||0||25||2 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !206!!51!!6!!3!!0!!0!!212!!54 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bandung Category:Dutch footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:USV Elinkwijk players Category:FC Utrecht players Category:SC Cambuur players Category:FC Den Bosch players Category:FC Dordrecht players Category:Tulsa Roughnecks (1978–1984) players Category:K.
